explains: adj. 邻近的；附近的（等于 neighbouring）
v. 与……为邻；位于附近（neighbor 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: "That was a relief," said the neighboring houses.
sentences.cn: “这是一种解脱。”邻近的房子说。

sentences.en: They were more spacious than neighboring buildings.
sentences.cn: 它们比附近的建筑物宽敞。

sentences.en: The negotiations with neighboring communities are ongoing and difficult.
sentences.cn: 与邻近社区的谈判仍在进行，而且困难重重。
